title: Enhanced fluorometric detection of histamine using red emissive amino acid-functionalized bimetallic nanoclusters
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,18970-18977
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02010C, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yahya S. Alqahtani, Ashraf M. Mahmoud, Al-Montaser Bellah H. Ali, Mohamed M. El-Wekil
A new LYS@Ag/Au NCs fluorescent probe was designed for selective and sensitive detection of histamine. Addition of histamine led to fluorescence quenching through aggregation.
